documentation.text: @notice Emitted when asset manager is rebalanced
@return the current assets under management of this asset manager

@return poolCash - The up-to-date cash balance of the pool
 @return poolManaged - The up-to-date managed balance of the pool

@return The difference in tokens between the target investment
 and the currently invested amount (i.e. the amount that can be invested)
@notice Updates the Vault on the value of the pool's investment returns
@notice Determines whether the pool should rebalance given the provided balances

attributes.text: @notice Emitted when asset manager is rebalanced
@return the current assets under management of this asset manager

@return poolCash - The up-to-date cash balance of the pool
 @return poolManaged - The up-to-date managed balance of the pool

@return The difference in tokens between the target investment
 and the currently invested amount (i.e. the amount that can be invested)
@notice Updates the Vault on the value of the pool's investment returns
@notice Determines whether the pool should rebalance given the provided balances

params.amount: - the amount of tokens to withdraw back to the pool
params.poolId: - the poolId of the pool to withdraw funds back to

returns._0: the current assets under management of this asset manager

returns.poolCash: - The up-to-date cash balance of the pool
returns.poolManaged: - The up-to-date managed balance of the pool

returns._0: The difference in tokens between the target investment and the currently invested amount (i.e. the amount that can be invested)

params.force: - a boolean representing whether a rebalance should be forced even when the pool is near balance
params.poolId: - the poolId of the pool to be rebalanced

Rebalance(bytes32).notice: Emitted when asset manager is rebalanced

capitalOut(bytes32,uint256).notice: allows an authorized rebalancer to remove capital to facilitate large withdrawals

rebalance(bytes32,bool).notice: Rebalances funds between the pool and the asset manager to maintain target investment percentage.

shouldRebalance(uint256,uint256).notice: Determines whether the pool should rebalance given the provided balances

updateBalanceOfPool(bytes32).notice: Updates the Vault on the value of the pool's investment returns
